articles.author: Matt O'Brien
articles.title: AI and satellites help aid workers respond to Myanmar earthquake damage - AP News
articles.description: Just after sunrise on Saturday, a satellite set its long-range camera on the city of Mandalay in Myanmar, not far from the epicenter of Friday’s 7.7 magnitude earthquake that devastated the Southeast Asian country’s second-largest city. The mission was to cap…
